title: Cranberry, orange and walnut cake
ingredients: ['175g butter', '500g caster sugar', '3 eggs, beaten', '750g plain flour', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 1/2 tablespoons baking powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '525ml orange juice', '3 tablespoons orange zest', '325g chopped cranberries', '175g chopped walnuts']
